title: What is the level of cyberattacks in the EU?
subtitle: As of 2024, on average 7.32% of enterprises in the EU experienced cyber attacks.
textNote: Categories for cyber attacks on enterprises are defined as the following: Disclosure of confidential data (due to intrusion, phishing, pharming, or actions by employees â€“ intentional or unintentional) - Unavailability of ICT services (due to external attacks, hardware or software failures) - Destruction or corruption of data (due to malware, unauthorised access, hardware or software failures).
